name: Donquixote Doflamingo (OP01-060)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] [1] (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.): Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card is a "The Seven Warlords of the Sea" type Character card with a cost of 4 or less, you may play that card rested.

name: Donquixote Doflamingo (OP01-073)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Gecko Moria (OP02-054)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea

name: Bartholomew Kuma
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Play] Look at 2 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 "The Seven Warlords of the Sea" type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Jinbe
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On K.O.] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

name: Crocodile
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card is a "The Seven Warlords of the Sea" type card, draw 2 cards and place 1 card from your hand at the top of your deck.

name: Trafalgar Law (ST17-002)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Play] You may return 1 of your Characters to the owner's hand: If your Leader has the "The Seven Warlords of the Sea" type, return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.

name: Buggy
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top of your deck in any order.

name: Boa Hancock
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

[On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of your deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your "The Seven Warlords of the Sea" type Leader or Character cards.

name: Marshall.D.Teach
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may place 1 card from your hand at the top of your deck: Give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
